page.title: 06RADAR ESTABLISHMENT
page.content: The Royal Signals Radar Establishment was looked at because a lot of the parents from the school are employed there.The radar was first invented at the establishment during the Second World War to find the enemy planes. The jets, called Jaguars and Phantoms, test the radar out to see if the radar will pick up the planes.Their flight path is over our school. In the RSRE they construct gadgets such as the thermal imager.The thermal imager can detect the hot bits on machines from the cold bits.The cold bits are grey and the hot bits are white.The thermal imager is very useful for 'seeing' in dark or foggy conditions.RSRE research work will form the foundation for the defence of Britain in the future.
